<p class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align:center;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
background:#F4F7FC"><br></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="text-indent: 24pt; line-height: 16.5pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:#FF6805;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><a href="http://www.china-b.com/" target="_blank"><span lang="ZH-CN" style="color:#FF6805;text-decoration:none;text-underline:none">育龙网</span></a></span></b><b><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:
宋体;color:#FF6805;mso-font-kerning:0pt">核心提示：</span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:11.5pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
0pt"> C++</span><span style="font-size:11.5pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:
宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">中是通过流的方式来访问文件的，比如说语句<span lang="EN-US">ifstreamin</span>（<span lang="EN-US">"str.txt"</span>，<span lang="EN-US">ios</span>：：<span lang="EN-US">in</span>）；，就打开了文件<span lang="EN-US">str.txt.</span>我们可以通过<span lang="EN-US">in.read</span>（）来读<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="text-indent: 24pt; line-height: 21.6pt; background-color: rgb(244, 247, 252); background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">C++</span><span style="mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">中是通过流的方式来访问文件的，比如说语句<span lang="EN-US">ifstreamin</span>（<span lang="EN-US">"str.txt"</span>，<span lang="EN-US">ios</span>：：<span lang="EN-US">in</span>）；，就打开了文件<span lang="EN-US">str.txt.</span>我们可以通过<span lang="EN-US">in.read</span>（）来读取流<span lang="EN-US">in</span>（也就是文件<span lang="EN-US">str.txt</span>）中的数据。现在问题来了：我们怎么判断何时读到了这个文件的末尾呢？ 中国自学编程网整理发布<span lang="EN-US"> www.zxbc.cn<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="text-indent: 24pt; line-height: 21.6pt; background-color: rgb(244, 247, 252); background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span style="mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">在<span lang="EN-US">C++</span>中，文件的结束标志是<span lang="EN-US">EOF——</span>顾名思义，<span lang="EN-US">EndOfFile.</span>也就是说，在文件的某个字节<span lang="EN-US">b</span>后面加入一个<span lang="EN-US">EOF</span>，就表示这个字节<span lang="EN-US">b</span>就是该文件的最后一个字节了。这里顺便说一句，<span lang="EN-US">EOF</span>占一个字节的大小，其值为<span lang="EN-US">-1.<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="text-indent: 24pt; line-height: 21.6pt; background-color: rgb(244, 247, 252); background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span style="mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">还是举个例子吧！<span lang="EN-US">——</span>运行环境为<span lang="EN-US">MicrosoftVisualC++2005.#includefstream#includeiostreamusingnamespacestd;intmain()...{charc=’a’;ofstreamout("str.txt"</span>，<span lang="EN-US">ios::out);for(inti=0;i10;i++</span>，<span lang="EN-US">c++)out.write(&c</span>，<span lang="EN-US">sizeof(char));out.close();inti=0;ifstreamin("str.txt"</span>，<span lang="EN-US">ios::in);while(in)...{c=in.get();coutc;i++;}couti;cin.get();}<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="text-indent: 24pt; line-height: 21.6pt; background-color: rgb(244, 247, 252); background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span style="mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">在<span lang="EN-US">in</span>读完字符<span lang="EN-US">‘j’</span>的时候，其实已经到达文件的末尾了，但此时流<span lang="EN-US">in</span>的状态还是<span lang="EN-US">good</span>，也就是说还可以继续读入下一个字节。而当<span lang="EN-US">in</span>继续往下读的时候，就会读到<span lang="EN-US">EOF</span>了，当读完<span lang="EN-US">EOF</span>并赋值给<span lang="EN-US">c</span>后，流<span lang="EN-US">in</span>的状态就变成了<span lang="EN-US">eofbit</span>，不可再读，在条件判断语句中流<span lang="EN-US">in</span>也就成了<span lang="EN-US">false</span>了。所以真正读入的字节数其实是<span lang="EN-US">11</span>，而不是文件的长度<span lang="EN-US">10.<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="text-indent: 24pt; line-height: 21.6pt; background-color: rgb(244, 247, 252); background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span style="mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">而文件的输出为<span lang="EN-US">abcdefghij<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>
